ing: 2 tablespoons brown sugar, or more to taste
des: "Make this tasty homemade chili sauce in a flash with ingredients you will have already in your cabinets.  Definitely less expensive than prepared, and you can adjust to your liking. Keep covered and refrigerated between uses."
ins: Whisk tomato sauce, brown sugar, vinegar, chili powder, allspice, garlic powder, and onion powder together in a  bowl.
